MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St. Andrews. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.39am. Our emergency response team is currently on site and are connecting generators to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.48pm on Wednesday 3rd of March 2021
